General.Name: Dacian Gold Limited
General.Description: Dacian Gold Limited engages in the exploration, mining, and processing of gold properties in Australia. The company holds interest in Mt Morgans and the Redcliffe gold project located in Leonora-Laverton, Western Australia. Dacian Gold Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Perth, Australia. As of February 20, 2023, Dacian Gold Limited operates as a subsidiary of Genesis Minerals Limited.
General.Address: 58 Mounts Bay Road, Perth, WA, Australia, 6000

1.Name: Mr. Derek J. Humphry ACA, B.Com, C.A.
